environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_API_CLIENT_ID
environmentVariables.description: Atlas API client ID for authentication. Required for running Atlas tools.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_API_CLIENT_SECRET
environmentVariables.description: Atlas API client secret for authentication. Required for running Atlas tools.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_ATLAS_TEMPORARY_DATABASE_USER_LIFETIME_MS
environmentVariables.description: Time in milliseconds that temporary database users created when connecting to MongoDB Atlas clusters will remain active before being automatically deleted.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_CONFIRMATION_REQUIRED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: An array of tool names that require user confirmation before execution. Requires the client to support elicitation.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_CONNECTION_STRING
environmentVariables.description: MongoDB connection string for direct database connections. Optional, if not set, you'll need to call the connect tool before interacting with MongoDB data.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_DISABLE_EMBEDDINGS_VALIDATION
environmentVariables.description: When set to true, disables validation of embeddings dimensions.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: An array of tool names, operation types, and/or categories of tools that will be disabled.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORT_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MS
environmentVariables.description: Time in milliseconds between export cleanup cycles that remove expired export files.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORT_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Time in milliseconds after which an export is considered expired and eligible for cleanup.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORTS_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Folder to store exported data files.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_HTTP_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Host to bind the http server.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_HTTP_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Port number.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_IDLE_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Idle timeout for a client to disconnect (only applies to http transport).

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_INDEX_CHECK
environmentVariables.description: When set to true, enforces that query operations must use an index, rejecting queries that perform a collection scan.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_LOG_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Folder to store logs.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_LOGGERS
environmentVariables.description: Comma separated values, possible values are 'mcp', 'disk' and 'stderr'.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_BYTES_PER_QUERY
environmentVariables.description: The maximum size in bytes for results from a find or aggregate tool call. This serves as an upper bound for the responseBytesLimit parameter in those tools.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_DOCUMENTS_PER_QUERY
environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of documents that can be returned by a find or aggregate tool call. For the find tool, the effective limit will be the smaller of this value and the tool's limit parameter.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_NOTIFICATION_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Notification timeout for a client to be aware of disconnect (only applies to http transport).

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_READ_ONLY
environmentVariables.description: When set to true, only allows read, connect, and metadata operation types, disabling create/update/delete operations.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_TELEMETRY
environmentVariables.description: When set to disabled, disables telemetry collection.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_TRANSPORT
environmentVariables.description: Either 'stdio' or 'http'.

environmentVariables.name: MDB_MCP_VOYAGE_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for Voyage AI embeddings service (required for vector search operations with text-to-embedding conversion).
